retrieveAndStoreImage

protected ImageItem retrieveAndStoreImage(String id,
                                          String tag,
                                          boolean replaceExisting,
                                          String photographerCheckId)
Method retrieveAndStoreImage causes a flickr retrieval of the image (and photographer). Saves/updates to the local db.

Parameters:
id - flickr ID of image
tag - challenge tag
replaceExisting - - if true will remove an image if retrieving an image with the same photographer for the same challenge.

ImageItem - null if no image found
